content: pocket penguin by erica townsend owner of gracie s petals & bows measures approx 3 long materials hook 3 5mm darning needle worsted weight yarn in yellow orange black grey and white i used bernat super value note in the pattern i used a fine velvet yarn that someone gave to me but it didn t have a label on it so i can t tell for sure what size and brand it is but it does add a nice texture to the penguin and worked the same as the worsted weight yarn stuffing safety eyes 6 mm scissors terms chain chain st stitch repeat * slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet two stitches together as one stitch to decrease gauge 12 single_crochet x 10 row using 3 5mm hook = 2x2 or just use a hook that is small enough stuffing won t show through instructions head starting with black yarn and 3 5mm hook work in continuous rounds round 1 chain 2 work 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 8 single_crochet rounds 2-3 2 single_crochet in every st around 16 single_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 5 sts change to white yarn single_crochet in next 3 sts change to black yarn single_crochet in next st change to white single_crochet in next 3 sts change to black single_crochet in next 4 sts 16 single_crochet rounds 5-6 single_crochet in next 5 sts change to white yarn single_crochet in next 7 sts change to black single_crochet in next 4 sts 16 single_crochet fasten_off white and hide ends round 7 single_crochet in every st around 16 single_crochet insert safety eyes between rounds 4 and 5 in the middle of each white section in that row stitch on a nose with the orange yarn switch to grey yarn if you want a more defining edge around the eyes you can take some white yarn and stitch in and out along the top of the stitches to make a more rounded edge this is what i did rounds 8 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next st* repeat from * to * around 24 single_crochet rounds 9-11 single_crochet in every st around 24 single_crochet round 12 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts* repeat from * to * around 32 single_crochet round 13-14 single_crochet in every st around 32 single_crochet rounds 15 *decrease in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * around 24 single_crochet start stuffing the body round 16 *decrease in next st single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 16 single_crochet round 17 decrease around 8 single_crochet finish stuffing fasten_off and hide all ends and sew hole closed wings make 2 using black yarn round 1 chain 2 4 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 4 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next repeat all 6 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat all
